Text.Page:
We're mounting an incursion on the occupied areas of the temple.

Engage the naga survivors guarding the first floor of the temple, including {@LinkCreature:42#100#besharan slaves}, {@LinkCreature:42#1300#sellswords}, and {@LinkCreature:42#400#smugglers}, {@LinkCreature:42#500#vigilant chikas}, {@LinkCreature:42#600#skeletal watchers}, and {@LinkCreature:42#710#cruel bone imps}.

Report to Glasrinne at Frontera when you're done.
You're still needed here, <PCNAME>. There's much you can do.
It's not an easy assignment, but we're counting on you.
